text_1_facilitator.eng:
Children learn best by playing and doing. 

@data.characters.f1_father.name wants to spend more time helping his daughter , @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, learn through play together. Let’s see how he does it.

character_1_text.eng: Hi, dear. Would you like to do something fun together?

rows.text_1_facilitator:
Children learn best by playing and doing. 

@data.characters.f1_father.name wants to spend more time helping his daughter , @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name, learn through play together. Let’s see how he does it.
rows.character_1_text: Hi, dear. Would you like to do something fun together?

character_1_text.eng: What would you like to do?

character_2_text.eng: Build a house out of pillows!

character_3_text.eng: Great idea! What do we need to do first?

rows.character_1_text: What would you like to do?
rows.character_2_text: Build a house out of pillows!
rows.character_3_text: Great idea! What do we need to do first?

character_1_text.eng: First, we place one pillow against the headboard. It’s our first wall! Then, we can use another pillow for the other wall. And a third pillow to make the roof!

character_2_text.eng: It's lovely to see you thinking everything through so carefully.

rows.character_1_text: First, we place one pillow against the headboard. It’s our first wall! Then, we can use another pillow for the other wall. And a third pillow to make the roof!
rows.character_2_text: It's lovely to see you thinking everything through so carefully.

character_1_text.eng:
Well done,
@data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name! This is a wonderful pillow house.

character_2_text.eng: Can we read our bedtime story here tonight?

rows.character_1_text:
Well done,
@data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name! This is a wonderful pillow house.
rows.character_2_text: Can we read our bedtime story here tonight?

text_1_facilitator.eng: @data.characters.f1_father.name helped his daughter learn by playing together. Let’s explore how he did this.

quiz_1_question.eng: What did @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name learn when her father played with her?

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Actually, their play together helped @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name to lead and give instructions. By self-directing, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name learned how to give clear instructions and lead an activity. This is an important skill for any successful adult!There are other correct answers in this list. Did you find them all?

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng:
That’s right! By creatively imagining what a home could be, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name finds an innovative way to repurpose a pillow. In her imagination, she could be building a castle, a tent, or space shuttle. Innovation and creativity are critical skills for the future. 

This isn’t the only thing @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name learned! Did you find the other things she learned?

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Rather than copying the home he lives in, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name is encouraged to imagine new possibilities & problem solve. By imagining a world with a house that doesn’t yet exist, and creatively solving a challenge, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name is learning critical skills for academic and professional success. There are more right answers in this list. Did you find them?

quiz_1_feedback_4.eng:
That’s right! By testing and trying materials to build a house, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name is learning critical STEM skills and the parts of 3-dimensional shapes. 

There is more than one answer in this list! Did you find them all?

quiz_2_question.eng: How did @data.characters.f1_father.name help his daughter learn these skills?

quiz_2_option_1_text.eng: By telling her what to do

quiz_2_feedback_1.eng: Rather than telling her, he played with her. Their play time together created so many opportunities to learn new skills.

quiz_2_feedback_2.eng: Actually, by simply playing with his daughter and letting her lead the activity, @data.characters.f1_father.name helps his daughter learn. He doesn’t have to show her how to build a fort, she learns on her own with natural consequences.

quiz_2_feedback_3.eng: Exactly! When @data.characters.f1_father.name lets his daughter lead, he allows her to explore the laws of gravity (will the pillows fall?), 3-dimensional shapes, and build communication skills.

quiz_2_feedback_4.eng: That’s right. When @data.characters.f1_father.name praises his daughter, she learns that it is good to be curious, inventive, and attentive to detail. She is more likely to repeat these behaviours in the future because she has been praised for them.

rows.quiz_1_feedback_1: Actually, their play together helped @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name to lead and give instructions. By self-directing, @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name learned how to give clear instructions and lead an activity. This is an important skill for any successful adult!There are other correct answers in this list. Did you find them all?

This isn’t the only thing @data.characters.f1_daughter_2.name learned! Did you find the other things she learned?

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Children (just like us) can learn a lot from their mistakes.

Let’s look at how @data.characters.f1_father.name supports @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name to learn from her mistake when she struggles to put on her shoes.

rows.text_1_facilitator:
Children (just like us) can learn a lot from their mistakes.

Let’s look at how @data.characters.f1_father.name supports @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name to learn from her mistake when she struggles to put on her shoes.

character_1_text.eng: Let me put your shoes on.

character_2_text.eng: No, I want to do it myself!

character_3_text.eng: Okay, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name, you can do it yourself.

rows.character_1_text: Let me put your shoes on.
rows.character_2_text: No, I want to do it myself!
rows.character_3_text: Okay, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name, you can do it yourself.

text_2.eng: @data.characters.f1_son_4.name doesn't push his foot in all the way and struggles to fasten the shoes.

character_2_text.eng: Yes, you can! How about I help you with one foot, and you do it with the other?

rows.character_2_text: Yes, you can! How about I help you with one foot, and you do it with the other?
rows.text_2: @data.characters.f1_son_4.name doesn't push his foot in all the way and struggles to fasten the shoes.

character_1_text.eng: Hold your shoe in both your hands. Now, place your left foot in the shoe. Almost there! Wiggle your toes and make sure your heel is all the way in. Good job! Now, you try with your right shoe.

character_3_text.eng: Great job,@data.characters.f3_son_4.name! You are becoming a strong boy!

rows.character_1_text: Hold your shoe in both your hands. Now, place your left foot in the shoe. Almost there! Wiggle your toes and make sure your heel is all the way in. Good job! Now, you try with your right shoe.
rows.character_3_text: Great job,@data.characters.f3_son_4.name! You are becoming a strong boy!

text_1_facilitator.eng: Let’s look at how @data.characters.f3_uncle.name helped @data.characters.f3_son_4.name help him learn from the mistake.

quiz_1_option_1_text.eng: He fixes what he was doing wrong for him.

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Rather than fixing the problem himself, @data.characters.f3_uncle.name gives clear and specific instructions to help him learn. @data.characters.f3_uncle.name carefully instructs @data.characters.f3_son_4.name on how to put on his shoes, helping him to do it himself.

quiz_1_option_2_text.eng: He get frustrated when he struggles

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: When @data.characters.f3_son_4.name struggles, @data.characters.f3_uncle.name actually remains calm and patient. This is important when teaching children new tasks.

quiz_1_option_3_text.eng: He praises him when he does it himself.

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Yes, praise helps our children to take more responsibility for their actions next time.

quiz_1_option_4_text.eng: He tells him he is going to do it for him when he is struggling.

quiz_1_feedback_4.eng: @data.characters.f3_uncle.name actually encourages @data.characters.f3_son_4.name to keep trying after he struggles. This shows support and helps him to learn to do it himself!

quiz_2_option_1_text.eng: I can keep trying even if I make a mistake.

quiz_2_feedback_1.eng: Exactly! @data.characters.f3_son_4.namelearns it’s okay to make mistakes and keep trying because @data.characters.f3_uncle.name encourages him to keep trying even when he struggles.

quiz_2_option_2_text.eng: I am supported as I learn new things.

quiz_2_feedback_2.eng: Exactly! @data.characters.f3_son_4.name learns that he is supported while learning new tasks, as @data.characters.f3_uncle.name calmly guides him.

quiz_2_option_3_text.eng: It is important that an adult do this task for me.

quiz_2_feedback_3.eng: @data.characters.f3_son_4.name actually learns the value of trying things on his own, with @data.characters.f3_uncle.name offering praise and support rather than taking over the task.
